pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AutoRA Prolific Recruitment ManagerProlific Recruitment Manager provides functionality to recruit participants via Prolific to set up an experiment runner for AutoRA.# Quickstart GuideYou will need:`python` >=3.8,<4: [https://www.python.org/downloads/](https://www.python.org/downloads/)!!! It is recommended to use a python environment manger like virtualenvInstall the package via pip:```shellpip install "aurora[experiment-runner-recruitment-manager-prolific]"```## Test```shellpython -c "from autora.experiment_runner.recruitment_manager.prolific import setup_study"```## Dependenciesautora-core
